current.registration_text: Registering for this site allows you to access your order status and history. Just fill in the fields below, and we’ll get a new account set up for you in no time. We will only ask you for information necessary to make the purchase process faster and easier.
current.sub_tetx_about_me:
Argan Almond Butter, known as “Amlou” is a delicious Moroccan dip that has been in Moroccan kitchens for centuries. Growing up in a traditional Moroccan family in Casablanca, Argania Butter's founder Nadia realized that there was a need for the delicious, mouth-watering Argan Nut butter spread that she grew up eating.

Argania Butter is a family owned business. Our Argan Nut butters are from a family recipe, handed down for over 75 years from the Atlas region of Morocco.

All of our creations are Gluten-Free, GMO-Free, Dairy-Free, and contain the super food Organic Argan Oil. This “liquid gold” makes our products rich in vitamin A and vitamin E. It is also packed with antioxidants, Omega-6 fatty acids, Omega-3 fatty acids, and linoleic acid.

Health

  • Vegan

  • No Gluten

  • Kosher

  • Non GMO

  • No Palm Oil

  • Peanut-Free

  • No Dairy

  • Low Carb

Culture

We are proud of our Moroccan roots and the long history of the Moroccan culture.

Longevity

Just like our Moroccan culture, Argania Butter is here to stay. We will do everything to maintain our brand and our customer's loyalty to our products.

Our Mission: Giving Back

Argania Butter strives to provide a win-win solution that helps protect the Argan tree biosphere reserve and supports your health and wellness. We care for the people we work with, the planet we live on, and the welfare of everyone involved.

settings.title: About Argania
settings.html:
Incredibly Healthy & Delicious Moroccan Almond Butters made with Culinary Argan Oil. Beauty Starts from the inside 💫✨.

Rancho Palos Verdes , CA 90275
Phone: (714) 862-8147

settings.title: Filter by color
settings.shop_by_tags_color: Blue, White, Red, Black, Brown, yellow, green

settings.title: Filter by color
settings.shop_by_tags_color: Blue, White, Red, Black, Brown, yellow, green

settings.title: Why we use Argan Oil?
settings.richtext: The amazing health benefits of eating argan oil> This miracle oil is packed with goodness, including essential fatty acids and antioxidants (including vitamin E, polyphenols, linoleic acid, and sterols), making it a common addition to luxury skincare products, but those same ingredients make a culinary necessity. The only difference between the argan oil you put on your face and culinary argan oil is that the argan oil you eat is made with roasted kernels to bring out its glorious nutty flavor.

settings.title: What is Argan Oil?
settings.richtext: The New York Times calls it “liquid gold” and beauty & lifestyle bloggers rave about its numerous nutritional and skincare benefits. The people of Morocco have been enjoying its nutritional, healing, and skin-loving powers for centuries!

settings.author: Sofia O.
settings.quote: This Maple Argania Butter is pretty freaking incredible! It's healthy enough to add to meals, but honestly I ate it straight from the jar as dessert most nights! It has just the right amount of sweetness.

settings.author: Yass S.
settings.quote: I ordered the coconut and Honey flavor. Hands down this is the most delicious Almond Butter i ever had! The extra nuttiness flavor from the Argan made it so tasty! This is my new go to Almond Butter brand!

settings.title: [social-instagram]FOLLOW @arganiabutter
settings.subtext: Posuere eget ut sed consectetur litora lobortis cras
